message.content:
I'll help you add data quality checks to your dbt model and set up incremental loading for late-arriving records.

## Plan

1. Add not_null and unique tests on customer_id in schema.yml.

2. Add accepted_values test on the status column for common values like active and inactive.

3. Configure the model as incremental using updated_at as the watermark column.

## Files

- ✎ models/silver/customer.sql — add incremental config
- ✎ models/silver/schema.yml — add basic DQ tests
